title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Crash Pad
content:
Wanna make a living selling scrap for cash? Yeah, you could do that. Or you could turbocharge your profit margin by stealing vehicles from some of the biggest names in town.

Gate-crashing Arena War, boarding secure cargo ships, and infiltrating the LSPD might sound dangerous, but with a buyer like Yusuf Amir on the line, the payout is worth the risk. The Salvage Yard is now available to purchase from Maze Bank Foreclosures.
